desc: The Wrangler JK and JL Upgrade Experts. Genuine Teraflex Suspension lifts, Falcon Shocks, Topfire bumpers, fenders, steps and hardware, Lighting, Warn Winches, MyTop 8s Soft-Tops, Jeep Audio, Speaker and Camera upgrades, Fuel Rims, Tyres and Jeep accessories. Fully installed in South Africa or delivered to your door.

layout.text: @ ANGRiJeep, Jeeps are our passion and your Wrangler should be as amazingly unique as you are. Our exclusive range of genuine FUEL OFFROAD wheels, Stainless Steel Bumper hardware, Electric Soft-Tops, Free-Flow Exhausts, Crystal Clear Audio Upgrades coupled with industry leading Teraflex Suspension, Visual Hardware, Expert Design and perfect installation... Buy online for Nationwide delivery, pop in or call us on 021 180 4990 to transform your Wrangler today.
